title: I tried Asus' new dual-screen ZenBook, and it might just be my new laptop for work travel
contentSnippet: The Asus ZenBook Duo (2026) is everything I wanted from the previous-gen model, earning it a Best of CES award for 2026.
content: The Asus ZenBook Duo (2026) is everything I wanted from the previous-gen model, earning it a Best of CES award for 2026.
